Posts.Content: I wanted to say hello, as well as thank you for being here. It has been almost a year since my surgery and it seems I am on track, for lack of a better term.
Posts.Signature: First PSA at age 48, Check by family DR. 4.3 Early June 2013 Met with Urologist, DRE negative, retested PSA 4.7 Mid July Biopsy Early August, 6 of 12 samples positive Gleason 6 3+3 CT and bone Scan negative, DaVinci Radical Prostatectomy Sept 17 2013 Foly catheter removed, one week Pads used for several months retested PSA after surgery and every 3 months .01,.00,.03,.00 slight erection, have hope
Posts.Title: First time posting
